item.title: #D19
item.description:
#D19

Here's one tantalizing possibility: WE CHANGE THE WAY MONEY FLOWS! What is the capitalist algorithm but a machine that runs on money? And running the machine are the people who skim off the top from bank fees, interest rates, mortgages, currency trades, payday loans, stock dividends.

item.title: Alien Aesthetics | Bruce Sterling | TEDxDeakinUniversity
item.description:
Alien Aesthetics | Bruce Sterling | TEDxDeakinUniversity

Alien Aesthetics Michael Bruce Sterling is an American science fiction author who is best known for his novels and his work on the Mirrorshades anthology. This work helped to define the cyberpunk genre. This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community.

4004

Tim McNerney's original goal for starting this project was to make the invisible machinery of the first computers-on-a-chip visible and understandable to students and the lay public. The 4004 is great for many reasons, but for this project it's number one selling point is that it is a minimal CPU.

item.title: After Decades in a Food Desert, These Neighbors Are Building a $2 Million Co-op-And They Own It
item.description:
After Decades in a Food Desert, These Neighbors Are Building a $2 Million Co-op-And They Own It

This article is a part of New Economy Week, where we bring you the ideas and people helping build an inclusive economy. Last year, we told you about Greensboro residents' plan to start their own grocery. This year, we checked in with them on how they pulled it off.

item.title: No title
Laser Cut Dollar Sculptures by Scott Campbell
item.description:
Laser Cut Dollar Sculptures by Scott Campbell

Artist Scott Campbell uses a laser cutter to carve astonishing sculptures out of US dollars. The intricate designs found in many of his sculptures hint at his other occupation-tattoo artist & owner of Saved Tattoo in Brooklyn. via Gaks Designs & Hi-Fructose photos via Scott Campbell

item.title: Cakes With Teeth by Scott Hove
item.description:
Cakes With Teeth by Scott Hove

Oakland-based artist Scott Hove has created cake sculptures complete with gaping toothy mouths as part of his upcoming "Your Deadly Desserts" show at Modern Eden in San Francisco, October 8 to November 4. via Hi Fructose photos via Hi Fructose
